Post Type Summary

Post Type Sidebar Key Features Use Case
standard Yes Normal typography, traditional layout General blog posts
featured No Full-width hero, large typography Highlighted articles
breaking No Alert banner, live updates Time-sensitive news
opinion Yes Author emphasis, pull quotes Editorial content
review Yes Star rating, pros/cons grid Product reviews
tutorial Yes Step numbering, progress indicator How-to guides
listicle No Numbered sections, quick-nav List-based content
interview Yes Q&A formatting, speaker labels Interview transcripts
